definition[0]: if you blow a flame or a fire out, or if it blows out, it stops burning
example[0]: The match blew out in the wind.
definition[1]: if a tyre blows out, it bursts
definition[2]: if a storm blows itself out, it ends
definition[3]: to kill yourself, or someone else, with a shot to the head
definition[5]: if you blow out your knee or another joint in your body, or if it blows out, you injure it badly
definition[6]: if an oil or gas well blows out, oil or gas suddenly escapes from it
definition[7]: to stop having a friendship or relationship with someone
